  • Package com.company.Model

    • Class com.company.Model.Course

      class Course extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject
          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream ois) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
          reads serialized objects from the file, reads the custom serialized transient attribute (enrolled students list)
          Parameters:
          ois - is the ObjectInputStream object
          Throws:
          ClassNotFoundException
          IOException - if there occurs an error with the ObjectInputStream
        • writeObject
          private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream oos) throws IOException
          writes serialized Course objects to the file custom serialization for the attribute (students enrolled list) as an empty list, in order to avoid circular references
          Parameters:
          oos - the ObjectOutputStream object
          Throws:
          IOException - if there occurs an error with the ObjectOutputStream
